device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
use_cases_desc:
Two games: 
- collaborative snake game
- collaborative tower defense game
contribution_desc:
Magnet-based proximity sensing for connecting mobile phones to a unified workspace (e.g., for games).
Called MagMobile, attaches magnets and hall sensors to the back of phones.
tracking_characteristic: Inside-out tracking; Proximity; Tracking devices only
tracking_tech: Magnetic, magnets and hall sensors at the mach/sides of device
